ABOUT.TEXT:
I'm a professional Full Stack software developer with 6 years of experience, with a greater focus on frontend development and design. My current development stack is NodeJS/Electron + MongoDB + Vue/Angular, although I'm comfortable working with other JS/TS and CSS libraries/frameworks, such as Astro and Tailwind.

Also, I'm a hobbyist graphic designer. While I started doing illustrations, these abilities have clearly been very influential in all of my software's UI/UX designs, plus my personal touch of, I believe, good taste.

Whenever I'm not programming, I'm still programming, but not the usual, everyday web development. I've always been fascinated with the extensive diversity of fields in computer science, so every now and then I find myself doing other things, like reverse engineering and low-level programming, which not only gives me a good rest from centering containers and playing with colors, but also improves my overall skills in a way that otherwise wouldn't be possible. Also, hacking is what the cool kids do.

Be sure to visit my portfolio to see all my works, and the articles page to read interesting things that I usually write from time to time.

CODING.TITLE: Coding
CODING.TEXT: Full Stack web developer, computer and software enthusiast in general. Reaching the objectives of my projects with clean, documented and efficient code, performance, security, and a lot of love.

DESIGN.TITLE: Design
DESIGN.TEXT: Graphic design, illustrations, UI/UX, you name it. Always ensuring quality even on the little details, while embracing simplicity and modern design.
